summary: Provides a suite of unit‑test helpers and test cases that construct and manipulate various NDR (Network Data Representation) structures—such as conformant/varying strings, null pointers, padded structs, and fixed or varying arrays—to verify the correct encoding/decoding behavior of the impacket DCE/RPC implementation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of NDR serialization logic used in network protocol tooling, enabling reliable DCE/RPC communication and simplifying future maintenance of the impacket library.
